Comment: Anticipating your antagonist's reaction, then having the next step in mind ready to go is strategic thinking in geopolitics. This is not that, because step one was not even considered - the mouth just flapped, and noise came out of it. And it will not work out well for him, again.

Author: sullyball008

Comment: It's probably just market manipulation. In spite of the tariffs, the market continues to grow which shows a disassociation between margins and stock prices. He understands he can have a large effect through adjusting consumer sentiment with the tariffs causing fluctuations that allow him and his allies to profit off buying dips.  Sad that we've come to the point that market growth continues in spite of the actual conditions it operates under and that only mass panic leads to general losses.
